channel.title: How can i make a 317 server?
channel.description: alright i look on youtube and on here for everything but i cant get a server online i cant find a source and a client to change my ip, im just so confused i need help onhow to start making my own server, where I host it, i have netgear also which is making it much more difficult! plz someone help me

item.title: How can i make a 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

People would use the hosts (that would be your computer) IP Address, you can find that here: http://whatismyip.com
And rather than giving us your ip (Which would be considered advertising), you can see if your server is online using http://canyouseeme.org
You have to open your server port though, so use this site: http://portforward.com (Router List)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a 317 server?

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“rawr i am scary, post:7, topic:359160”]Learning base?

Pfft, if you want to start “learning” use something better than that, like a Delta (They aren’t much better)

Or go ahead and start in a packaged server, like Emulous.[/quote]

The sad thing is the majority of people on this forum can barley program Czar.
